instruction: Generate an outline for an article that explores the effects of global warming on food security.
output:
I. Introduction 
A. What is global warming and why is it important? 
B. What is food security? 
C. How are global warming and food security connected? 

II. Negative Effects of Global Warming on Food Security 
A. Rising Temperatures 
B. Changing Rainfall Patterns 
C. Soil Erosion and Degradation 

III. Positive Effects of Global Warming on Food Security 
A. Increased Crop Yields in Some Areas 
B. Diversification of Crops 

IV. Potential Solutions 
A. Conservation Strategies 
B. Adaptive Cropping Practices 
C. Renewable Energy Sources 

V. Conclusion
